document.full_text: former israeli president moshe katsav was sentenced to seven years in jail for rape on tuesday in a case that prime minister benjamin netanyahu said showed "that no person is above the law."
document.title: former israeli president katsav gets 7 years for rape
lines_and_colors: former israeli president moshe katsav was sentenced to seven years in jail for rape on tuesday in a case that prime minister benjamin netanyahu said showed "that no person is above the law."
